title: Japan defense chief Koizumi considering U.S. trip
description: Japanese Defense Minister Shinjiro Koizumi is considering visiting the United States in mid-January to hold talks with his counterpart Pete Hegseth, sources familiar with Japan-U.S. relations said Tuesday. The two sides are expected to discuss the promotion o…
